what: Municipality yearly female population estimates per age group from 2000 to 2021 — datasus_mun_female_pop
title: Municipality yearly female population estimates per age group from 2000 to 2021 — datasus_mun_female_pop
text: dataset containing female population estimates Brazilian municipalities per age groups 2000 2021.

title: Municipality yearly female population estimates per age group from 2000 to 2021 — datasus_mun_female_pop
Municipality yearly female population estimates per age group from 2000 to 2021 — datasus_mun_female_pop
text: object class spec_tbl_df (inherits tbl_df, tbl, data.frame) 2216016 rows 4 columns.

title: Municipality yearly female population estimates per age group from 2000 to 2021 — datasus_mun_female_pop
text: estimates computed DataSUS (Brazilian Ministry Health), manually downloaded DataSUS website, organized tibble. code_muni municipality 6 digits code year year estimative age_group age group pop population estimative

what: Municipality population from IBGE estimates, Census and population inquiries from 2000 to 2022 — ibge_pop
title: Municipality population from IBGE estimates, Census and population inquiries from 2000 to 2022 — ibge_pop
text: dataset containing total population estimates Brazilian municipalities IBGE estimates, Census population inquiries. dataset contain breakdowns age groups sex.

title: Municipality population from IBGE estimates, Census and population inquiries from 2000 to 2022 — ibge_pop
Municipality population from IBGE estimates, Census and population inquiries from 2000 to 2022 — ibge_pop
text: object class tbl_df (inherits tbl, data.frame) 128133 rows 3 columns.

title: Municipality population from IBGE estimates, Census and population inquiries from 2000 to 2022 — ibge_pop
text: population data downloaded IBGE's SIDRA service. Population data years 2000 2010 obtained Census, SIDRA table 202 (https://sidra.ibge.gov.br/Tabela/202). Population data year 2022 obtained Census, SIDRA table 9514 (https://sidra.ibge.gov.br/Tabela/9514). Population data year 2007 obtained Population Inquiry, SIDRA table 793 (https://sidra.ibge.gov.br/Tabela/793). Population data years 2001 2006, 2008, 2009, 2011 2021 obtained Population Inquiry, SIDRA table 6579 (https://sidra.ibge.gov.br/Tabela/6579). code_muni municipality 7 digits code year year pop population

title: Municipality yearly female population estimates per age group, from 2010 to 2030 — ufrn_mun_female_pop
text: FREIRE, F.H.M.; GONZAGA, M.R; QUEIROZ, B.L. Projeção populacional municipal com estimadores bayesianos, Brasil 2010 - 2030. : Sawyer, D.O (coord.).  Seguridade Social Municipais.
